title: Shelley Manor
description: Third person puzzle game, with fixed cameras in the style of the old resident evil games, made in UE 5.2.

title: Elysium Engine
description: A proprietary engine written in C++ that uses OpenGL and DirectX, and integrates physics, sound and physics-based rendering.

title: The son of Chronos
description: A motion-sensor based VR game, inspired by Super Hot, made with the Unity engine.

title: Keyboard Party
description: A multiplayer game made on the Unity engine.

title: Web 2.0 IVAO Spain
description: The new websites/systems of the Spanish division of the IVAO organisation, made with NestJS and React.
